Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and into the terminal, due to a festival near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Buses will operate in both directions via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and then into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

 

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to Fiesta Boricua.

Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed at Kimball
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing at Kimball due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing at Kimball due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
